detailsOfAchievement: Our NGO â€œNikhila Utkal Harijan Adivasi Seva Sanghaâ€ is a state level registered voluntary organization, dedicated and committed to the upliftment of the dis-advantaged sections of the society. At present, our organization is engaged in running one residential Secondary School for Scheduled Tribe Students in Sambalpur district of Orissa state with financial assistance of the Ministry of Tribal Affairs, Govt. of India, and one residential Primary School for Sch. Caste students and one integrated Rehabilitation Centre for addicts in the district of Bhadrak, Orissa with financial assistance of the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment, Govt. of India. More over, our organization is also managing one rehabilitation centre for women victims of trafficking at Bhadrak in Orissa state with financial assistance of the Minstry of Women and Child Development, Govt. of India. Besides the NGO is implementing one T. I. (HIV/AIDS Prevention) project with AIDS Control Society and other programmes like- Community Mosquito net Impregnation programme, R. N. T. C. P. programme for improvement in public health. In the Past, the NGO has implemented national crÃ¨che program, shorthand and type-writing training program and Handloom and hand knitting training program with financial assistance of the govt. of India. Different ministries of govt. of India, Orissa state govt., central social welfare board, state medicinal plant board, Orissa and National AIDS control organization have come forward to add assist our organization in implementation of different welfare programmes. Our organization has a team of dedicated and sincere volunteers, who can shoulder any responsibility. Ours is a written constitution and bye-law and the president and governing body members are, democratically, elected. Every year the accounts of our organization is audited by one chartered accounts farm. We have vision to take up new projects for upliftment of the dis-advantageous society of our state in future and have vigour to face the challenges in course of activities.

detailsOfAchievement: NIRMAN, a grassroots organization focuses on food, nutrition and livelihood security of Adivasi and small holder farmers in Nayagarh, Kandhamal, Rayagada, Deogarh, Kalahandi and Jajpur of Odisha. It has established 3 millets processing units in remote tribal villages for dehusking millets for drudgery reduction of Adivasi women. 600 Tribal families secured legal rights of 750 acres of land and ensured Community Rights to 69 villages over Community Forest Resource using Forest Rights Act, 2006.

detailsOfAchievement: "Nrutyayan" is a leading institution in the field of Odissi dance & music which has been striving for past twenty years to promote the cultural heritage of Odisha. About 300 students of India and International origin are being trained at his institute, "Nrutyayan". About 100 nos. Students have received Junior/Senior Scholarships from the Govt. of India, 10 students have received "Sringaramani Title" from Sur Shringar Samshad, Mumbai. 12 nos. students received Junior Fellowship from the Deptt. of Culture, Govt. of India. About 30 nos. students have been empanelled in I.C.C.R, New Delhi. Many of his disciples have received awards including the prestigious "Mahari Award", "Sanskriti Samman" etc. The students have participated in different cultural activities Including project work in Germany under DAAD (German Academic Exchange Service) Fellowship. One students Sangeeta Dash has been honoured with State Academy Award and Leena Mohanty with Bismilla Khan Award of behalf of Central Sangeet Natak Academy, New Delhi. About 25 nos. students have been recognised as "A" Grade artists of Doordarshan Kendra. Another students Kumari Madhumita Mishra is done her Ph.D in the field of Odissi dance with the topic. "The Jagannath Temple and Sculptures" under Guru Sri Durga Charan Ranbir. the students of Nrutyayan have been Participated in different major dance festival in India and abroad ogranised by Sangeet Natak Academy, New Delhi, E.Z.C.C., S.Z.C.C., N.Z.C.C., Dept. of Culture & Tourism, Govt. of Orissa and other private cultural intuitions.

detailsOfAchievement: Activities ODD Foundation is a social development organization in the state of Orissa working with a concern for human suffering arising out of drug deaddiction , mental illness, physical diseases as HIV/AIDS and poverty. The foundation has 4 separate wings. NISTHA, the Drug Deaddiction â€“Cum -Research Centre, established on 4th December 1997 with focus on preventive, curative and rehabilitative aspects provides services such as deaddiction, aftercare, follow-up, rehabilitation etc. applying its own innovative research â€“ based methodologies. IRCA, the 15-beded Integrated Rehabilitation Centre for Addicts with support from Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment Govt. of India., extends the services of deaddiction further. EMPATHY, the half-way home for psycho-social rehabilitation of the treated & controlled mentally ill has been providing comprehensive and interdisciplinary care and vocational Training for the mentally ill. EROS, the community care centre for people living with HIV/AIDS provides integrated services as care and counseling, referral services for clinical management, linkages with various govt. and non- govt treatment and counseling centres and support for last rites . Orissa AIDS solidarity Forum supported by the Action Aid, BBSR is working as a collective for protection of the rights of PLWA in partnership with NGOs, CBOs, individual activists and networks since 2006. Reducing the risk of HIV/AIDS among IDUs through peer led Intervention at urban slums of BBSR, in partnership with the Calcutta Samaritans, EAST â€“ II (RRTC)/ DFID has been one of the key activities of the organization . Community based integrated sexual / reproductive health interventions in urban slums of BBSR and rural Keonjhar district of Orissa, formation/ strengthening of youth Forums, social support etc. are the other key activities undertaken. The organization worked in close collaboration with the Orissa State Beverages Corporation Govt. of Orissa, to prevent and control alcohol and other drugs in the whole state by undertaking multimedia awareness and advocacy campaign . Achievements . - So far over a thousand drug addicts have received treatment out of which as many as 700 cases are leading drug free life. - Heightened the level of awareness in all sections of the society about the dangers and effects of drugs and its nexus with HIV/AIDS by multi-media campaign. - Reduced the risk of HIV/AIDS among IDUs through SPYM Peer led Interventions at urban slums of BBSR. - Occupationally rehabilitated about 50 recovering addicts through vocational training. - Over 200 cases of mentally ill have been treated with successful rehabilitation of 36 cases. - Over 300 cases of HIV positive people have been provided integrated services through EROS. - Established one state level platforms of the PLHIV for protection and promotion of the rights of PLWA. - Established the 1st +tve Womenâ€™s Network (SHRADHA) in the state. - Rehabilitated over 55 slum children of CSWs through integrated health and educational interventions. - With support from Catalyst Management Services, Bangalore, the organization undertook mapping to identify 100 high-risk villages in Khurda District of Orissa for implementation of Link Workers Schemes on HIV/AIDS supported by NACO.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The Design Clinic is a scheme of Govt. of India. This program was conducted in Cuttack Industrial Estate of Cuttack City. As this organisation is functioning for development & promotion of micro & small scale industries of this state, this awareness program was conducted to aware the MSME entrepreneurs of this state regarding the aim & objects of this scheme & benefits to be availed by them from Central Govt. through this scheme.

To facilitate the MSME ancillary industries of Western Odisha, who are depends upon mother plants i.e. RSP, MCL, Hindalco, L&T, Bhusan Steel, Aditya Aluminium, etc, OASME organised a National Level Vendor Development Program-Cum-Buyer-Seller at Rourkela. Through this program, Hunderds of MSME ancillary units were benefited & make themselves aware about the ancillarization program of large houses & PSUs.

Bargarg District as well as other neighboring districts like Balangir, Sambalpur, Sonpore, etc, are famous in Odisha for producing agro based food products like Maize, Corn, Vegetable, Fruits, etc. Therefore so many food processing industries have set-up in that area depending on above agro products. So, OASME had organized that program to create awareness between the entrepreneurs to function under various cluster, , so that, they can get benefits through various Govt. schemes.

detailsOfAchievement: The PEOPLEâ€™S FORUM being founded on 2nd October, 1988 has stressed on sustainable development and equitable justice as its priority agenda. This twenty one years old organisation is an initiation of a dream, seen by few benevolent youth who craved for a better society by helping the people to help themselves. They started this organisation as a podium for activists who were supposed to fight for the under privileged and weaker sections. The platform accommodated each and every person who needs security and justice at their level. Keeping in mind the principles of Pujya Bapuji, the organisation founded its pillar on the birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi, 2nd October 1988. Gradually the organisation attained recognition under Society Registration ACT XXI of 1860 in 1990, 12 (A) of income tax registration in 1995, FCRA Registration ACT OF 1976 IN 1995 and Ind 80(G) registration under income tax in 2004. Now with all pride itâ€™s an opportunity for Peopleâ€™s Forum that the organization of 21 years is promoting different institutions and trying for self-sufficiency. It has declared itself as a single mental health rehabilitation center in entire eastern zone. Till today we have recued more than 500 hundred destitute abandoned and neglected mentally ill mentally challenged women from various corner of the state in and around. The rehabilitation center has 167 inmates with 15 children and 152 inmates were reunited with their respective families. Including this we are also involved in various activities like Microfinance, Entrepreneurship development progmmes, rural Marketing, Agriculture and pisciculture farms, Training institution, Business Development support services, etc though initiated earlier but truly be strengthened during this period. However in spite of our shift over approaches, it is vital to mention that the organization has never left out any of its prior responsibilities. Rather it is still attached to the activities done years before keeping its original vision and mission intact. Out of the many told activities PEOPLEâ€™S FORUM has initiated few programs & activities highlighting few issues being operated through different cells created for specific purposes, with its minimum resources & tiny work force which are presented here under. Core area : ï‚§ Mental Health & Community Health ( programme on rescue , rehabilitation and re integration ) ï‚§ Women development ï‚§ Health & nutrition ï‚§ Trafficking Women & girls( programme on rescue , rehabilitation and re integration ) ï‚§ Micro Finance ï‚§ Natural resource management ï‚§ Human rights ï‚§ Economic viability of the deprived mass ï‚§ Care for the disabled with special emphasis to the aged ï‚§ Environment and sanitation ï‚§ Emergency relief and rehabilitation ï‚§ Disaster preparedness Operational Strategy ï‚§ Vocational training, occupational training ï‚§ Rescue, treatment, rehabilitation, reintegration with the community and family ï‚§ Workshops, training, seminar, health camps, rally, exhibition etc.( at central and field level) ï‚§ Networking ï‚§ Observation of important days

‘Project PREMA’ is an innovative programme of skill training and entrepreneurship development focused on marginalized sections of the society, mostly women of scheduled tribe, scheduled caste and fisher folk. It is a joint venture of Peoples Rural Education Movement (PREM) and AXIS Bank Foundation, a Corporate Social Responsibility initiative of AXIS Bank, one of the leading private banking organizations of India.

The project intends to form a model village with a model vision, micro-plan and a model Gram Sabha. Besides, the model village concept brings transformation among the people from magical or naïve consciousness to critical.

detailsOfAchievement: It is a great pleasure for us to present the activities undertaken by PEOPLES WELFARE VOLUNTARY ORGANISATION .Which speaks of our humble Endeavour and achievement, being a grass root level Social Organization during the short tenure of its inception the following activities are undertaken. AIDS AWARENESS PROGRAMME By organizing Programme on HIV AIDS PWVO enlighten the people of its operational area about the dreadful effects of sexual transmitted diseases, Humane Immune Virus HIV and Acquired Immune deficiency syndrome AIDS and other health hazards caused due to want of precautionary measures. ENVIRONMENT AWARENESS Life and Environment are interdependent. The Environment Awareness campaign is considered as the most important as it is most beneficial programme for the local people. PWVO Organized different Awareness campaign and action oriented programme during its tenure at different places of its operational area. R C H PROGRAMME By giving importance in executing various programmes relating to improved health and hygienic condition of the pregnant women and children, prevention of six killer diseases of the children during childhood, balance diet for the mothers Lactating mothers and other health care services to be adopted during prenatal and postnatal stages. SANITATION PROGRAMME A Good and healthy sanitation has a significant bearing on the life and health of people. In rural areas least care is given to sanitation. As a result women, children and the people at large face different physical and health hazards during the short tenure of the organisation we organised different awareness and action oriented programme at different rural villages of Khurda District. SHG FORMATION AND TRAINING The status of women in independent India occupies an important place and all efforts are being made to establish the significant that she can play in the upliftment of her own, her family and the society. To create confidence among these rural women and bring about an awareness of their own potential.PWVO has conducted several awareness programme among the rural women in its operational area VOCATIONAL TRAINING Realizing that lack of skill on the part of the people being the root of their poor socioeconomic condition, PWVO organized vocational training in various skills in order to enable them to earn their livelihood, NATIONAL INTEGRATION CAMP A Close eye is being kept by the organization towards promotion of communal harmony, universal brotherhood and establishment of National integration. Our organisation Organised different programme on youth development. CHILD LABOUR WORKSHOP To create consciousness among people about the issue of child labor and make them aware about the abrupt impact of that issue the organization had arranged workshop on child labour at different places of Khurda district. SC ST DEVELOPMENT The organization is playing a very crucial role for upliftment of the most Marginalized communities who are otherwise designates as resource poor communities. In the pretext, awareness, research, training and action oriented programmes for the benevolence of the said categories were being carried out at different places of Khurda District.

detailsOfAchievement: The organisation has got bar in the year 1998 under the registration of Additional. Registrar of Societies ,Khordha.The area of opretion had been extended to through out Orissa and organisation has been registred under IGR. Cuttack.The organisation has its registration office ,Bhubaneswar and branch office at district Kendrapara and Rayagara.The organisation has its owned assets,mskilled and experienced manpower.The following are the some of the apreciable activities which the organisation has conducted at its operational area. 1.Agriculture/Horticulture:The organisation had conducted the programme of transfer of technology and exhibition of Root and Tuber crops by supports of National Horticulture Board in the year 2002-03 and 2003-04. 2.SSG and Micro Credit: The organisation has promoted 45 no. of SHG,and 25 no of SHG at the district Kendrapara and Rayagara respectivily. Presently a project on SHG promotion is continunig at block Muniguda by support of NABARD. 3.Vocational/SDP:The activities on vocational promotionhad been conducted by the organisation at Garadpur block by support of Food and Nutrition Board. Also presently the skill development programme on bamboo craft and food processing by support of NABARD is under progress at Muniguda block of district Rayagara. 4.Youth Promotion: The organisation had conducted vocational programme on TV and Radio repairing and computer in the year 2004-05 and 05-06 respectivly by support of Ministry of Youth affairs and Sports, Govt. of India. Also it had conducted the National Integration block level camp by support of District Addministration Rayagara in the year 2008-09.A camp on National Integration for youth promotion had been conducted in Khordha district in the year 2009-10 by support of Ministry of Youth affairs Govt of India 5.Women Development:The organiation had conducted the programme of self employement of women by training in the scheme NORAD in the year 2005-06 by support of W& CD deptt Govt of India.Also it had conducted the awareness generation programme training for women in the year 2005-06 and 2008-09 by support of State Social Welfare Board,Bhubaneswar. 6.Healt & Family welfare:The organisation has conducted no. of health camps at block Muniguda of district Rayagara and conducted the programme of yoga and Naturopathy for healthy lifein the districtKendrapara and Rayagara for students, women and general public by support of National Institute of Naturopathy, deptt of AYUSH Ministry of Health and Family Welfare,Govt of India. 7.Animal welfare:The organisation had conducted rescue,at disater,vaccination and clinical camp for animals and got support from district head quarter Animal Welfare Kendrapara for animal sences. 8.Disaster Litigation:The organisation has participated in the flood and cyclone work of district addministraion Kendrapara and conducted the DRM programme at Muniguda block of district Rayagara. 9.Disable Development:The organisation is registred on act PWD of 1995 for service of disables and it had survyed the disables of Kendrapara district and started a vocational effort by own effort. 10. Awareness:It had conducted the awareness on road safety in the city Bhubaneswar and got financial support in the year 2004-05 for this programme Ministry of Road and Transport.Also it had got support from Redcross Rayagara for conduction of Aids awareness programm in the year 2005-06. The SC/ST promotional activities and save women labour activities in the district Rayagara is well known.The organisation activities on art and culture in the district Khordha and Kendrapara is appreciable.

title: PRAFULLA KAR FOUNDATION
detailsOfAchievement: Activities of the Prafulla kar Foundatioion : Prafulla Kar Foundation is established in the year 2007. This is formed by some of his fans and music lovers of Pandit Dr Prafulla kar( Padmashree Awardee) to give honour to the great artist and the music legend of our time and propagate, poppularise his classically enriched musical creations among the generations to come. Foundation has been providing platform to upcoming artists by organising district and state level mucical talent hunt programmes and competitions. Foundation too organises a Grand musical programme for budding musical talents namely kamala Desha Ra Nua Kalikaa (Buds of Kamala Desha) every year . From this platform, some of the child singers has proved their excellence in national level competitions. Foundation has been putting effort to preserve the valuable and memorable musical creation of Prafulla Kar. Not only pandit Kar, we also have planned to establish a Public Archive of eminnent singer and musicians of Odisha and India gradually. We organise seminars, conferences and consultation workshop on Music in regular intervals. Foundation publishes articles and songs of pandit kar. Too the foundation organises theme based musical event for the public like Bhakti Dhara, Bansa Dhara and many more . Foundation organises two days musical festival for of this music legend every year i.e. 15th and 16th February. We felicitate an artist of national international reupte with Prafulla kar Samman with a cash award of 1 lakh rupees in this two days long grand musical extravaganza namely Kamal Desha Raaja kumar every year. Few of those awardees are Bhajan and gazal maestro Anup Jalota ji, eminent singer Vanee Jayaram ji, Anuradha powdwal ji, Late pandit Raghunath Panigrahi and many others.And also felicitate the senior artists of extincting art like Pala, sankirtana, Daskathia etc with cash awards. About pandit Prafulla Kar ( Padmashree and Kendriya Sangeeta Natak Academy Awardee) For more than four decades now Praffula Kar has audiences and fans in Orissa and abroad with his distinctive singing , compositions and lyrics. His Position as a performer is Pre-eminent the compelling power of his music continues to attract a large cross section on the listening public. Added to this oblivious talent, his precocity as Music Director and Poet have gradually transformed him into a Cultural Icon of formidable standing. Born in 1939 into a family of Musicians or Sangeet Gharana pandit Praffula Kar showed early promise as a singer at home in Puri, the abode of Lord Jagannath. His fathers elder brother Sri Khetra Mohan Kar was a renowned Table Player, who could bring down the artistes of National repute Like Hirabai Barodekar, Maitra, A kanan & Malabika Kanan and many others as family friends to their home. Praffula Kar has directed the music of an amazing for more than 70 Oriya Films (Released an non-released) as well as Four Bengali films. For his outstanding contributions to the field of Film music, the Govt. of Orissa has honoured Sri Kar with Best Director Award for Oriya films on eight occasions . out of which six were given on consecutive occasions , a record achievements even at the National level. Today he â€œis a colossus in the world of pan Indian Musicâ€ Under his music direction in film many play back singers of National repute like Anuradha Paudwal ,Usha Mangeskar, Kavita Krishnamurty,Suresh Wadkar,Md.Aziz,Kishore Kumar, Amit Kumar, etc (from Mumbai)-Vani Jairam , S.Janaki, P. Sushila, Chitra, Swaranalata, Yesu Das, S.P. Balsubramanyam, Manu, etc.(from Chenni)- Arati Mukarjee, Nirmala Mishra, Sipra Bose, pandit Ajaya Chakrabarty, Haimavanti Sukla, etc. (from Kolkata) have rendered their voice for Oriya and Bengali Films. He has introduced more than twenty playback singers of Orissa in his film.

detailsOfAchievement: Pratisruti is working on Project and Issues. Every year it is conducting Inter School Essay, Debate, Quiz and Drawing competitions on Indian regional culture and traditions. We also conduct health awareness programmes on Cancer, Leprosy, Maleria/Fileria etc. We organize free family planning operations, Blood Donation Camps, Eye Camp, Polio Camp, Diabetes Camp etc. Our organization is supporting Old age persons with hygiene nutrition, free entertainment and free health facilities. Free Legal Advocacy to the suffered victims. Imparting Free Vocational Trainings, availing them bank loans to the rural and urban youths and women and helping them to run production units and making market tie ups for sale purpose in local markets and exhibitions like Gram Shree Mela, ORMAS and Palli Shree Mela etc. Also Running Mushroom Cultivation and Spawn production unit imparting free skill up-gradation training to the clusters and also supporting them with various Govt. programmes and schemes like Janashree Bima Yojna, Sikshya Sahayak Yojna, Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojna etc. In tribal sectors we are concerning about liveli hood for which we are developing agriculture, plantation of banana, cotton and medicinal plants etc. We are working on literacy programmes for pre school education for children, Bridge course education for child labour, women labour, tribals, Adolescent girl child, Adult education etc. We are providing micro insurance services for the policies of Govt. i.e., Jeevan Mangal and Jeevan Madhur. Counselling and Research on rural issues, sex trafficking, Gender Issues and problems and its overcome solutions. We are also working for the people who had been deprived of their legal rights and cause which are working under unorganized sectors. More than 200 children were mainstreamed to formal schools, more than one thousand lifeâ€™s of poor women have been made successful and now they are established in running and marketing the products of applique, tailoring, rexine, palm leaf work, agarbatti making, chalk making, riffle making, incense making, coir work, toys making etc. Free awareness and counseling programmes on AIDS which leads the victims to gain confidence and to restart their ruined life again. It is working through out the state of Odisha. It is mainly working and achieved in the field of education, health, environment, sanitation, liveli hood, disaster management, social forestry etc.

The organisation emphasises to provide skill training in respect of Tailoring product of Appliqué, Palm leaf work, Agarabti making, Coir work, Pattachitra and other house hold articles to generate income by rural women.
